p:
sgRNAs targeting specific genes were designed using an online CRISPR tool
1 . For each target gene, two sgRNAs were designed that are located on both sides of variation region within the open reading frame. To minimize the off-target effect, we chose those with a high comprehensive score. Following that, the sgRNA oligos were blasted against PRV genome to ensure their high specificity. The sgRNA plasmid of CRISPR/Cas9 was constructed as previously described ( Ren et al., 2015). In brief, the oligo pairs were synthesized ( Supplementary Table S1) and annealed under the following condition: 5 min at 95°C, 30 min at 25°C. The purified product was then cloned into the plasmid pX335 (sgRNA/Cas9 expression vector) at the restriction site of BbsI followed by verification by DNA sequencing.
